name: Forsaken Café
description:
Forsaken Café: Made in 14 days for RNDGAME JAM II

(Theme: Forsaken Café)

It would be highly appreciated if you could rate and leave feedback after playing. Punished to work in a café, you work to gain the reputation, serving the denizens of the purgatory.Credits: Programmer & Art: Markus Franz [ITCH.IO]
Music & Composing: Samantha Van Der Sluis [SOUNDCLOUD]
Controls: F = INTERACT; SPACE = SKIP DIALOGUE; WASD = MOVEMENT; ESC = MENU;
